title: Drop everything and check out this insane 16-inch M3 MacBook Pro Prime Day sale
content:
Macworld

The 16-inch M3 MacBook Pro is the cream of the MacBook crop, with a price to match. But today’s pre-Prime Day deal makes it a lot friendlier on your wallet: Amazon is selling all configurations of the 16-inch M3 MacBook Pro for $500 off, an incredible savings and the best price we’ve ever seen. Here are the models offered:

M3 Pro 16-inch MacBook Pro, 18GB RAM, 512GB: $1,999 ($500 off, MSRP $2,499)

M3 Pro 16-inch MacBook Pro, 36GB RAM, 1TB: $2,399 ($500 off, MSRP $2,899)

M3 Max 16-inch MacBook Pro, 36GB RAM, 1TB: $2,999 ($500 off, MSRP $2,499)

M3 Max 16-inch MacBook Pro, 48GB RAM, 1TB: $3,499 ($500 off, MSRP $3,999)

Released in March, the 16-inch MacBook Pro has either an M3 Pro or M3 Max processor with 512GB or 1TB of storage and up to 48GB of RAM. You’ll also get Apple’s incredible ProMotion display, a bunch of ports (three Thunderbolt ports, an SD card reader, and HDMI 2.1), tremendous battery life, and the excellent Magic Keyboard. You can get it in silver or the new Space Black colorway.

Amazon’s Prime Day sale officially starts Tuesday, but we can’t imagine these prices going any lower. So if you want one, grab it now before the price jumps back up.
